articles.title: RFK Jr. pulls funding for mRNA vaccines as scientists pursue breakthrough treatments for HIV, cancer, the flu and more - yahoo.com
articles.description: The government has canceled nearly $500 million in research grants into the revolutionary technology, which experts believe could prove to be a game changer ...
articles.content: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. announced Tuesday that the federal government is canceling nearly $500 million in funding for the development of mRNA vaccines, a revolutionary new technology t… [+5943 chars]
